snippet.title: Fire breaks out in bedroom of home
snippet.content: BREAKING: A fire has broken out in a residence in Charters Towers and emergency crews have rushed to the scene. Fire crews first received reports of a fire in a bedroom at Hodgekinson Street, Charters Towers City about 7.30am today. A spokeswoman for the Queensland Fire and Emergency Services said crews were on scene and the fire had been contained in the room. The residents are believed to have evacuated safely. Fire crews are conducting atmospheric ventilation in the home.
